CHARACTER OUTPUT

      1                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
      2
      3                                         MOV     R2,-(SP)        ;;SAVE A
SCII CHARACTER
      4                                         TSTB    DDFLAG(R1)      ;;IS THI
S A 2741 ?
      5                                         BPL     50$             ;;NOPE
      6                                 .ASSUME TT2741  EQ      200
      7                                         CALL    MAPPED,R5,CVASCD ;;CONVE
RT ASCII TO 2741 CODE (USING PAR6 CODE)
      8
      9                                 .IF     EQ      DC11
     10
     11                                         BR      60$             ;;HARDWA
RE WILL COMPUTE ODD PARITY
     12
     13                                 .IFF
     14
     15                                         CMPB    #TTDC11,TTINTF(R1) ;;DC1
1 TYPE 2741?
     16                                         BNE     60$             ;;NOPE,
HARDWARE COMPUTES ODD PARITY
     17                                         MOV     R2,R3           ;;YEP, S
O SAVE THE CHARACTER
     18                                 30$:    ADD     #100,R2         ;;ADD IN
 ANOTHER BIT FOR PARITY
     19                                 40$:    ASR     R3              ;;MORE B
ITS IN ORIGINAL CHARACTER?
     20                                         BCS     30$             ;;YES, A
ND THIS ONE IS ON (ADD AGAIN)
     21                                         BNE     40$             ;;YES, B
UT THIS ONE IS OFF
     22
     23                                 .ENDC   ;DC11
     24
     25                                 50$:
     26
     27                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 149
CHARACTER OUTPUT

      1 010400  032761  020000  000036          BIT     #TTHPRT,TTINTF(R1) ;;DOE
S THE HARDWARE DO PARITY?
      2 010406  001020                          BNE     60$             ;;YES, S
O LET IT DO IT...
      3 010410  016103  000034                  MOV     TTCHAR(R1),R3   ;;NO, GE
T THE PARITY FLAGS
      4 010414  042703  176377                  BIC     #^C<TTPRTY!TTPODD>,R3 ;;
 AND ISOLATE THEM
      5 010420  001413                          BEQ     60$             ;;NO PAR
ITY, PASS 8-BIT CHARACTER
      6 010422  006203                          ASR     R3              ;;SHIFT
ODD-PARITY FLAG TO 200 IN LOW BYTE
      7 010424                          .ASSUME TTPODD/2        EQ      200
      8 010424                          .ASSUME TTPRTY/2&377    EQ      0
      9 010424  042702  177600                  BIC     #^C<177>,R2     ;;STRIP
THE CHARACTER TO BE 7-BIT
     10 010430  050203                          BIS     R2,R3           ;;MAKE T
HE CHARACTER HAVE THE SOUGHT PARITY
     11 010432  072327  177774                  ASH     #-4,R3          ;;SHIFT
FOUR BITS DOWN
     12 010436  074203                          XOR     R2,R3           ;; AND P
UT FOUR BITS TOGETHER FOR TABLE INDEX
     13 010440  042703  177760                  BIC     #^C<17>,R3      ;;ISOLAT
E TABLE INDEX
     14 010444  156302  000000G                 BISB    PTABLE(R3),R2   ;;TURN O
N 200 BIT IF PARITY SAYS SO
     15 010450                          60$:
     16
     17                                 .IF     NE      DH11 ! DJ11 ! DZ11
     18
     19 010450  005761  000036                  TST     TTINTF(R1)      ;;IS THI
S A MULTIPLEX LINE
     20 010454  100734                          BMI     20$             ;;YES. J
UST BUFFER THE CHARACTER
     21
     22                                 .ENDC   ;DH11 ! DJ11 ! DZ11
     23
     24 010456  016003  000000G                 MOV     CSR.KB(R0),R3   ;;GET CS
R ADDRESS
     25 010462  062703  000004                  ADD     #4,R3           ;;POINT
TO OUTPUT REGISTER
     26
     27                                 .IF     NE      SL2741
     28
     29                                         TSTB    DDFLAG(R1)      ;;2741 L
INE?
     30                                         BMI     10$             ;;YES, S
O ALWAYS JUST BUFFER CHARACTER
     31                                 .ASSUME TT2741  EQ      200
     32
     33                                 .ENDC   ;SL2741
     34
     35 010466  032327  000100                  BIT     (R3)+,#100      ;;ACTIVE
?
     36 010472  001325                          BNE     20$             ;;IF SO,
 THEN WE MUST BUFFER CHARACTER
     37 010474  005761  000010                  TST     DDFLAG(R1)      ;;STALLE
D FOR PAGING?
     38 010500  100722                          BMI     20$             ;;YES, J
UST BUFFER CHARACTER
     39 010502                          .ASSUME TTSTOP  EQ      100000
     40 010502  010213                          MOV     R2,(R3)         ;;OUTPUT
 THE CHARACTER
     41 010504  052743  000100                  BIS     #100,-(R3)      ;;ENABLE
 THE INTERRUPT
     42
     43                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
     44
     45                                         MOV     (SP)+,R2        ;;POP OR
IGINAL ASCII CHARACTER
     46
     47                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
     48
     49 010510                                  RETURN                  ;;RETURN
        010510  000207                           RTS    PC
     50

     53 010512                          GLOBAL  <PTABLE,CSR.KB>

FILL ROUTINES

      1                                 .SBTTL  FILL ROUTINES
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; SENDF1 - SEND FILL, FACTOR = 1.
      5                                 ;
      6                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
      7                                 ;-
      8
      9 010604  012746  000001          SENDF1::MOV     #1,-(SP)        ;;SET FI
LL FACTOR = 1
     10 010610  042761  002000  000010          BIC     #TTDFIL,DDFLAG(R1) ;; AN
D SAY FILLING DONE
     11
     12                                 ;+
     13                                 ; SENDFN - SEND FILL.
     14                                 ;
     15                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
     16                                 ;       (SP) = FILL FACTOR
     17                                 ;-
     18
     19 010616                          SENDFN::CALL    CHROUT          ;;IF FIL
LING SEND CHARACTER
        010616  004767  177552                   JSR    PC,CHROUT
     20 010622  116102  000000G                 MOVB    TTFCNT(R1),R2   ;; AND G
ET THE FILL COUNT
     21 010626  100407                          BMI     FTIMER          ;;PRETEN
D THE FACTOR IS ONE IF SERIAL LA30
     22 010630                          .ASSUME TTLA30  EQ      200
     23 010630  042702  177770                  BIC     #^C<TTFILL>,R2  ;;CLEAR
OFF THE EXTRA BITS

L=0 THEN EXIT NOW
     25 010636  005302                  10$:    DEC     R2              ;;COUNT
DOWN
     26 010640  001402                          BEQ     FTIMER          ;;DONE (
COUNT IS ON STACK)
     27 010642  006316                          ASL     (SP)            ;;INCREA
SE FILL COUNT
     28 010644  000774                          BR      10$             ;; AND L
OOP...

O SEND?

HE STACK ITEM
     35 010662                                  RETURN                  ;; AND E
XIT
        010662  000207                           RTS    PC

TABS ON OUTPUT

      1                                 .SBTTL  TABS ON OUTPUT
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; TO$TAB - OUTPUT A TAB.
      5                                 ;-
      6
      7                                 .ENABL  LSB
      8
      9 010664  032761  040000  000034  TO$TAB::BIT     #TTTAB,TTCHAR(R1) ;;HARW
ARE TAB ?
     10 010672  001007                          BNE     20$             ;;YES
     11 010674  012702  000040                  MOV     #040,R2         ;;NO, US
E <SPACE>'S
     12 010700                                  CALLX   TABSET,R5,CHOUT ;;SET IT
 UP
        010700  004537  000000G                  JSR    R5,@#TABSET
        010704  010112'                           .WORD CHOUT
     13 010706                          10$:      RETURN                ;;EXIT I
F NOT NOW AT LINE'S END
        010706  000207                           RTS    PC
     14 010710  000410                          BR      CKCRLF          ;;RESTOR
E CARRIAGE IF AT LINE END
     15
     16 010712                          20$:    CALLX   TABSET,R5,CORPOS ;;SET I
T UP
        010712  004537  000000G                  JSR    R5,@#TABSET
        010716  012566'                           .WORD CORPOS
     17 010720  000731                            BR    SENDF1          ;;SEND A
ND FILL (FACTOR=1)
     18 010722  132761  000004  000032          BITB    #TTCRLF,TTMODE(R1) ;;ARE
 WE WATCHING LINE WIDTH TO DO CRLF?
     19 010730  001325                          BNE     SENDF1          ;; IF NO
T, OUTPUT THE TAB ANYWAY
     20 010732                                  .BR     CKCRLF          ;;OTHERW
ISE  OUTPUT A CRLF.
     21
     22                                 ;+
     23                                 ; CKCRLF - SEND A CR/LF IF ALLOWED.
     24                                 ;-
     25
     26 010732  132761  000014  000032  CKCRLF::BITB    #TTECTL!TTCRLF,TTMODE(R1
) ;;CAN WE OUTPUT A CR/LF?
     27 010740  001362                          BNE     10$             ;;NO, SO
 DON'T
     28 010742                                  .BR     GOCRLF          ;;YES, S
O DO
     29
     30                                 .DSABL  LSB
     31
     32                                 ;+
     33                                 ; GOCRLF - SEND A CR/LF.
     34                                 ;-
     35
     36 010742                          GOCRLF::CALL    ASCOUT,R5,CRLF.0 ;;OUTPU
T <CR><LF>
        010742  004567  001036                   JSR    R5,ASCOUT
        010746  013450'                           .WORD CRLF.0
     37
     38                                 ;+
     39                                 ; CHKDLF - OUTPUT A LF IF NEEDED.
     40                                 ;-
     41
     42 010750  012746  000404          CHKDLF::MOV     #TTRSX2!TTRSX1,-(SP) ;;S
TACK THE <LF> NEEDED RSX MODE
     43 010754  046126  000010                  BIC     DDFLAG(R1),(SP)+ ;;DO WE
 NEED A <LF>?
     44 010760  001006                          BNE     10$             ;;NO
     45 010762  042761  000004  000010          BIC     #TTRSX1,DDFLAG(R1) ;;YES
, BUT INDICATE THAT WE SENT A <LF>
     46 010770                                  CALL    RSXCHR,R5,012   ;;GO OUT
PUT THAT REQUESTED <LF>
        010770  004567  001766                   JSR    R5,RSXCHR
        010774  000012                            .WORD 012
     47 010776                          10$:    RETURN                  ;;EXIT
        010776  000207                           RTS    PC

OUTPUT CARRIAGE RETURN

      1                                 .SBTTL  OUTPUT CARRIAGE RETURN
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; TO$CR - OUTPUT A CARRIAGE RETURN.
      5                                 ;-
      6
      7                                 .ENABL  LSB
      8
      9 011000                          TO$CR::
     10
     11                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
     12
     13                                         BIS     #TTCRO,ST2741(R1) ;;SAY
A <CR> WAS SENT
     14                                         TSTB    DDFLAG(R1)      ;;IS THI
S A 2741 ?
     15                                         BMI     10$             ;;YEP, S
O COMPUTE FILL
     16                                 .ASSUME TT2741  EQ      200
     17
     18                                 GLOBAL  <ST2741>
     19
     20                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
     21
     22 011000  105761  000000G                 TSTB    TTFCNT(R1)      ;;IS THI
S A LA30 SERIAL?
     23 011004  100042                          BPL     80$             ;;NOPE
     24 011006                          .ASSUME TTLA30  EQ      200
     25 011006  116102  000021          10$:    MOVB    DDHORC(R1),R2   ;;YES, G
ET LINE WIDTH
     26 011012  166102  000020                  SUB     DDHORZ(R1),R2   ;; AND F
IND THE CURRENT POSITION
     27 011016  042702  177400                  BIC     #^C<377>,R2     ;;HIGH B
YTE IS JUNK
     28 011022  012746  000002                  MOV     #2.,-(SP)       ;;GUESS
AT WITHIN 1ST 11. COLUMNS
     29
     30                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
     31
     32                                         TSTB    DDFLAG(R1)      ;;2741 ?
     33                                         BMI     20$             ;;IF SO,
 FILL == (POS/10.)+1.
     34                                 .ASSUME TT2741  EQ      200
     35
     36                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
     37
     38 011026                          GLOBAL  <TTFCNT>
 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 154
OUTPUT CARRIAGE RETURN

      1 011026  020227  000014                  CMP     R2,#12.         ;;GOOD G
UESS?
      2 011032  103414                          BLO     40$             ;;YES, F
ILL=2.+(POSITION/2.)
      3 011034  162702  000045                  SUB     #37.,R2         ;;NO, WI
THIN 1ST 36. COLUMNS?
      4 011040  002407                          BLT     30$             ;;IF SO,
 FILL=8. (=2.+(12./2.))
      5 011042  012716  000011                  MOV     #9.,(SP)        ;;IF NOT
, FILL=9.+(POSITION/10.)
      6
      7 011046  162702  000012          20$:    SUB     #10.,R2         ;;SO DIV
IDE BY
      8 011052  003406                          BLE     50$             ;; 10. A
ND COUNT
      9 011054  005216                          INC     (SP)            ;;  NUMB
ER OF TIMES WE DID...
     10 011056  000773                          BR      20$             ;;THIS S
HOULD END SOON

     12 011060  012702  000014          30$:    MOV     #8.-2.*2,R2     ;;FUDGE

OSITION/2

DD INTO TOTAL COUNT

O NO FILL EVER

     23 011130  000625                  100$:   BR      SENDF1          ;;NOPE,
SEND THEN CHECK FOR FILL

LINE FEED ON OUTPUT

      1                                 .SBTTL  LINE FEED ON OUTPUT
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; TO$LF - LINE FEED ON OUTPUT.
      5                                 ;-
      6
      7 011132                          TO$LF::
      8
      9                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
     10
     11                                         TSTB    DDFLAG(R1)      ;;2741 ?
     12                                         BPL     110$            ;;NOPE
     13                                 .ASSUME TT2741  EQ      200
     14                                         BIT     #TTCRO,ST2741(R1) ;;WAS
CR = <CRLF> SENT
     15                                         BEQ     SENDF1          ;;NO, SE
ND AND FILL 2 (FACTOR=1)
     16                                         BIC     #TTCRO,ST2741(R1) ;;CLEA
R CR FLAG
     17                                         RETURN                  ;; AND I
GNORE THE <LF>
     18
     19                                 110$:
     20
     21                                 GLOBAL  <ST2741>
     22
     23                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
     24
     25 011132  132761  000040  000034          BITB    #TTSCOP,TTCHAR(R1) ;;SCO
PE TYPE TERMINAL?
     26 011140  001373                          BNE     100$            ;;IF SO,
 THEN SEND AND FILL FACTOR = 1
     27 011142  000167  177024          TTKEEP::JMP     SNDCHR          ;;ELSE J
UST NORMALLY SEND THE CHARACTER

     41 011702                                  .BR     DOXON           ;;GO DO
THE XON OUTPUT ENABLE

CHECK AND START UP A LINE ROUTINES

      1                                 .SBTTL  CHECK AND START UP A LINE ROUTIN
ES
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; DOXON - (RE-)ENABLE OUTPUT AND START U
P A LINE.
      5                                 ;
      6                                 ;       R0 =  LINE NUMBER TIMES 2
      7                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
      8                                 ;
      9                                 ;       CALL    DOXON
     10                                 ;
     11                                 ;       R3 -> CSR
     12                                 ;-
     13
     14 011702  042761  100000  000010  DOXON:: BIC     #TTSTOP,DDFLAG(R1) ;;SAY
 OUTPUT IS NOW ENABLED
     15
     16                                 ;+
     17                                 ; CHKLIN - CHECK AND START UP LINE.
     18                                 ;
     19                                 ;       R0 =  LINE NUMBER TIMES 2
     20                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
     21                                 ;
     22                                 ;       CALL    CHKLIN
     23                                 ;
     24                                 ;       R3 -> CSR
     25                                 ;-
     26
     27                                 .ENABL  LSB
     28
     29 011710  005761  000010          CHKLIN::TST     DDFLAG(R1)      ;;IS LIN
E STALLED FOR PAGING?
     30 011714  100420                          BMI     40$             ;;YES, D
ON'T TRY TO START IT THEN
     31 011716                          .ASSUME TTSTOP  EQ      100000
     32
     33                                 ;+
     34                                 ; SRTLIN - START UP A LINE.
     35                                 ;
     36                                 ;       R0 =  LINE NUMBER TIMES 2
     37                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
     38                                 ;
     39                                 ;       CALL    SRTLIN
     40                                 ;
     41                                 ;       R3 -> CSR
     42                                 ;-
     43
     44 011716  016003  000000G         SRTLIN::MOV     CSR.KB(R0),R3   ;;UNCOND
ITIONAL LINE STARTUP
     45
     46 011722                          GLOBAL  <CSR.KB>
     47
     48                                 .IF     NE      DH11 ! DJ11 ! DZ11
     49
     50 011722  005761  000036                  TST     TTINTF(R1)      ;;IS THI
S A MULTIPLEXED LINE?
     51 011726  100010                          BPL     30$             ;;NO, SO
 SIMPLE STARTUP
     52 011730                          .ASSUME TTMUX   EQ      100000
     53 011730  010246                          MOV     R2,-(SP)        ;;YES, S
AVE R2
     54 011732                                  CALL    SUBLIN          ;;GET TH
E SUBLINE NUMBER *2
        011732  004767  172546                   JSR    PC,SUBLIN

CHECK AND START UP A LINE ROUTINES

      1                                 .IF     NE      DJ11 ! DZ11
      2
      3                                 .IF     NE      DH11
      4
      5                                         CMPB    #TTDH11,TTINTF(R1) ;;A D
H11 LINE?
      6                                         BEQ     10$             ;;YES
      7
      8                                 .IFTF
      9

     20                                 .ENDC   ;DJ11 ! DZ11

ASCII STRING SENDER

      1                                 .SBTTL  ASCII STRING SENDER
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; OUTPUT AN ASCII STRING, TERMINATED BY
A 0 BYTE.
      5                                 ;
      6                                 ;       CALL    ASCOUT,R5
      7                                 ;       +       STRING ADDRESS
      8                                 ;       ...     RETURN
      9                                 ;
     10                                 ;       R2 =    ASCIZ STRING ADDRESS
     11                                 ;       CALL    ASCPTR,R5
     12                                 ;       ...     RETURN
     13                                 ;-
     14
     15                                 .ENABL  LSB
     16
     17                                 .IF     GT      KBCORR+KBEBCD+KBBCD+KBC3
60-1.
     18
     19                                 ASCPTR::CMP     -(R5),-(SP)     ;;DUMMY
STACK ITEM AND RETURN ADDRESS CORRECTION
     20                                         BR      10$             ;;BUT SK
IP PICKUP OF STRING POINTER
     21
     22                                 .ENDC   ;KBCORR+KBEBCD+KBBCD+KBC360-1.
     23
     24 011764                          ASCOUU::
     25
     26                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
     27
     28                                         TSTB    DDFLAG(R1)      ;;2741?
     29                                         BMI     ASCOUT          ;;YES, S
O ALWAYS DO IT
     30                                 .ASSUME TT2741  EQ      200
     31
     32                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
     33
     34 011764                          ASCOUF::
     35
     36                                 .IF     NE      EKOCTL
     37
     38 011764  132761  000010  000032          BITB    #TTECTL,TTMODE(R1) ;;TER
MINAL OPEN FOR ECHO CONTROL ?
     39 011772  001032                          BNE     50$             ;;YES, S
O SKIP ARGUMENT AND EXIT
     40
     41                                 .ENDC   ;EKOCTL
     42
     43 011774                                  .BR     ASCOUE          ;;CONTIN
UE WITH THE CHECKING

DEVICE ASSIGNMENT SERVICE

      1                                 .SBTTL  DEVICE ASSIGNMENT SERVICE
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; ASN$KB - DEVICE ASSIGNMENT SERVICE FOR
 TERMINALS.
      5                                 ;
      6                                 ;       R0 =  JOB NUMBER OF ASSIGNER TIM
ES 2
      7                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
      8                                 ;
      9                                 ;       ...
     10                                 ;
     11                                 ;       RETURN          (WITH ALL REGIST
ERS PRESERVED)

     15

     18 000004                                  UNORG
     19

     21
     22                                 .SBTTL  DEVICE DEASSIGNMENT SERVICE
     23
     24                                 ;+

OR TERMINALS.
     26                                 ;
     27                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
     28                                 ;
     29                                 ;       ...
     30                                 ;
     31                                 ;       RETURN          (WITH ALL REGIST
ERS PRESERVED)
     32                                 ;-

     38 000004                                  UNORG

 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 170
SPECIAL FUNCTION SERVICE

      1                                 ;+
      2                                 ; SPC$KB - SPECIAL FUNCTION SERVICE FOR
TERMINALS.
      3                                 ;
      4                                 ;       R0 =  UNIT NUMBER TIMES TWO
      5                                 ;       R1 -> DDB/FCB
      6                                 ;       R2 =  SPECIAL FUNCTION CODE
      7                                 ;       R3 -> XRB
      8                                 ;       R4 =  CALLING JOB NUMBER TIMES 2
      9                                 ;       R5 -> (MAPPED) XRB
     10                                 ;
     11                                 ;       ...
     12                                 ;
     13                                 ;       JMP     RTI3
     14                                 ;
     15                                 ;       -OR-
     16                                 ;
     17                                 ;       ERROR   CODE
     18                                 ;
     19                                 ; LEGAL FUNCTIONS ARE:
     20                                 ;
     21                                 ;       0       CANCEL ^O
     22                                 ;       1       SET TAPE
     23                                 ;       2       CLEAR NOECHO AND TAPE
     24                                 ;       3       SET NOECHO
     25                                 ;       4       SET DDT MODE
     26                                 ;       5       FORCE TO KEYBOARD
     27                                 ;       6       BROADCAST TO KEYBOARD
     28                                 ;       7       CLEAR INPUT
     29                                 ;-
     30
     31 012306                                  TMPORG  SPCTBL,2
     32
     33 000002  012306'                         .WORD   SPC$KB
     34
     35 000004                                  UNORG
     36
     37 012306  012746  000000G         SPC$KB::MOV     #RTI3,-(SP)     ;SET OUR
 RETURN ADDRESS
     38 012312  005723                          TST     (R3)+           ;ADVANCE
 TO XRBC IN XRB
     39 012314  020227  000004                  CMP     R2,#4           ;IS FUNC
TION A SIMPLE FUNCTION?
     40 012320  101731                          BLOS    30$             ;YES, CO
DES 0, 1, 2, 3, 4
     41 012322  020227  000007                  CMP     R2,#7           ;MIGHT B
E...
     42 012326  101366                          BHI     80$             ;NO, ERR
OR, FUNCTION CODE > 7
     43 012330  001725                          BEQ     30$             ;YES, SI
MPLE, CODE IS 7
     44                                         ;BLO                    ;YES, CO
MPLEX, CODES 5 AND 6
     45
     46 012332                          GLOBAL  <RTI3>
 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 171
SPECIAL FUNCTION SERVICE

BF ;IS JOB PRIV'D?

OR

     26 012426  020227  000006                  CMP     R2,#6           ;GOOD GU

     27 012432  001403                          BEQ     90$             ;YES
     28 012434  012763  005344' 000020          MOV     #TTIN09,XRBUSE(R3) ;NO,

     29 012442  005723                  90$:    TST     (R3)+           ;POINT T
O XRBC
     30
     31 012444                          GLOBAL  <DEV.KB>
 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 172
SPECIAL FUNCTION SERVICE

      1 012444  005723                  100$:   TST     (R3)+           ;ANY MOR
E TO DO?
      2 012446  001426                          BEQ     120$            ;NOPE
      3 012450  010346                          MOV     R3,-(SP)        ;SAVE XR

      6 012464                                  CALL    @XRBUSE-XRLOC(R3) ;; AND
 DO OUR THING WITH IT
        012464  004773  000014                   JSR    PC,@XRBUSE-XRLOC(R3)
      7 012470                                  SPLC    3               ;;BACK T
O LEVEL 3 NOW
        012470  012737  034140  177776           MOV    #PR3,@#PS
      8 012476  012603                          MOV     (SP)+,R3        ;RESTORE
 XRB POINTER
      9 012500  005213                          INC     (R3)            ;BUMP XR
LOC
     10 012502  005343                          DEC     -(R3)           ; AND ON
E LESS BYTE IN XRBC
     11 012504  000757                          BR      100$            ;THEN AR
OUND AGAIN...
     12
     13 012506                          110$:   CALL    CHKFRE          ;;CHECK
FOR FREE BUFFERS
        012506  004767  176000                   JSR    PC,CHKFRE
     14 012512  103011                          BCC     130$            ;;O.K.,
SO DO IT
     15 012514                                  SPLC    3               ;;NO GO,
 DROP TO LEVEL 3
        012514  012737  034140  177776           MOV    #PR3,@#PS
     16 012522  022626                          CMP     (SP)+,(SP)+     ;POP RET
URN ADDRESS AND XRB POINTER
     17 012524  052761  000001  000010  120$:   BIS     #TTLFRC,DDFLAG(R1) ;INDI
CATE LAST WAS FORCE/BROADCAST
     18 012532                                  CALLR   CHKLIN          ;EXIT CH
ECKING FOR STARTING A LINE
        012532  000167  177152                   JMP    CHKLIN
     19
     20 012536                          130$:   CALLR   CHOUT           ;;DO THE
 BROADCAST
        012536  000167  175350                   JMP    CHOUT
     21
     22                                 ; TABLE FOR SIMPLE SPECIAL FUNCTIONS
     23
     24 012542  000010                  140$:   .WORD   DDFLAG          ;0 - SET

     25 012544     000     020                  .BYTE   0,TAPE          ;

SPECIAL FUNCTION SERVICE

      1                                 ;+
      2                                 ; CORPOS - CORRECT HORIZONTAL POSITION F
OR TABS.

      5 012566  105361  000020          CORPOS::DECB    DDHORZ(R1)      ;;CORREC

XIT
        012572  000207                           RTS    PC
      7
      8                                 .SBTTL  CHECK FOR ALLOWING ANOTHER JOB
      9
     10                                 ;+
     11                                 ; JOBCHK - CHECK IF ANOTHER JOB IS ALLOW
ED.
     12                                 ;
     13                                 ;       R0 =  KEYBOARD NUMBER TIMES 2
(OR 100001)
     14                                 ;
     15                                 ;       CALL    JOBCHK
     16                                 ;
     17                                 ;       R3 -> FREE SLOT IN "JOBTBL" +2
     18                                 ;
     19                                 ;       IF C=1 THEN A SLOT WAS FOUND
     20                                 ;       IF C=0 THEN NO SLOT OR NEW JOBS
NOT ALLOWED
     21                                 ;-
     22
     23 012574  012703  000002G         JOBCHK::MOV     #JOBTBL+2,R3    ;;LOOK F
OR A JOB NUMBER
     24 012600  021327  177777          10$:    CMP     (R3),#-1        ;;END OF
 JOBTBL (-1) ?
     25 012604  001417                          BEQ     30$             ;;YES, S
AY SORRY... (C=0 SINCE BEQ=>BHIS=BCC)
     26 012606  005723                          TST     (R3)+           ;;NO, IS
 THIS SLOT FREE?
     27 012610  001373                          BNE     10$             ;;CONTIN
UE LOOKING FOR A FREE SLOT
     28 012612  020027  000000                  CMP     R0,#0*2         ;;IS THI
S THE "CONSOLE TERMINAL"?
     29         012614'                 ..CTZ.  ==      .-2     ;**PATCH** 0 IF
KB0: CAN ALWAYS LOG IN, -1 IF NOT
     30 012616  001407                          BEQ     20$             ;;IT IS
CONSOLE, SKIP NEXT CHECK
     31 012620  020027  177777                  CMP     R0,#-1          ;;IS THI
S THE TERMINAL THAT CAN ALWAYS LOG IN?
     32         012622'                 ..CTY.  ==      .-2     ;**PATCH** ALWAY
S LOG-IN KB # * 2 (OR -1 FOR NONE)
     33 012624  001404                          BEQ     20$             ;;YES, S
KIP NEXT CHECK
     34 012626  126767  000000G 000000G         CMPB    JOBCNT,MAXJOB   ;;SHOULD
 WE ALLOW ANOTHER JOB?
     35 012634  103003                          BHIS    30$             ;;NO, AL
READY OVER # OF ALLOWED LOGINS
     36 012636  126767  000000G 000000G 20$:    CMPB    JOBCNT,MAXCNT   ;;IS ANO
THER JOB POSSIBLE?
     37                                         ;BHIS   30$             ;;NO, NE
VER ALLOW MORE THAN 'MAXCNT'
     38                                         ;BLO    30$             ;;YES, I
T IS ALLOWABLE
     39 012644                          30$:    RETURN                  ;;EXIT,
C=1 MEANS ALLOW THIS JOB
        012644  000207                           RTS    PC
     40
     41                                 .SBTTL  CHECK FOR ALLOWED INCOMING ESCAP
E SEQUENCES
     42
     43                                 ;+
     44                                 ; CHKESC - CHECK FOR ALLOWED INCOMING ES
CAPE SEQUENCE.
     45                                 ;-
     46
     47 012646  032761  000100  000034  CHKESC::BIT     #TTESCI,TTCHAR(R1) ;;ARE
 THEY ALLOWED?
     48 012654  001405                          BEQ     10$             ;;NO, FI
RST EXIT
     49 012656  132761  000002  000032          BITB    #TTTECO,TTMODE(R1) ;;YEP
, BUT IS THIS TECO??
     50 012664  001001                          BNE     10$             ;;FIRST
EXIT IF TECO...
     51 012666  005725                          TST     (R5)+           ;;ELSE A
LLOWED, TAKE 2ND EXIT
     52 012670                          10$:    RETURN  R5              ;;EXIT
        012670  000205                           RTS    R5
     53
     54 012672                          GLOBAL  <JOBTBL,JOBCNT,MAXJOB,MAXCNT>

RUN READER AND XON TERMINAL INPUT

      1                                 .SBTTL  RUN READER AND XON TERMINAL INPU
T
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ;       R0 =  LINE NUMBER TIMES 2
      5                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
      6                                 ;       PRIORITY IS PR5
      7                                 ;
      8                                 ;       CALL    XONINP          TO ALWAY
S ENABLE INPUT
      9                                 ;       CALL    ASKINP          TO CONDI
TIONALLY ENABLE INPUT
     10                                 ;
     11                                 ;       R3 =  UNDEFINED
     12                                 ;       R4 =  UNDEFINED
     13                                 ;-
     14
     15 012672  052761  040000  000010  XONINP::BIS     #TTXOFF,DDFLAG(R1) ;;SAY
 AN ENABLE IS DESIRED
     16 012700                          ASKINP::
     17
     18                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
     19
     20                                         TSTB    DDFLAG(R1)      ;;2741?
     21                                         BMI     10$             ;;YES, S
IMPLY ASK FOR AN INTERRUPT
     22                                 .ASSUME TT2741  EQ      200
     23
     24                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
     25
     26 012700  032761  040000  000010          BIT     #TTXOFF,DDFLAG(R1) ;;WAS
 AN XOFF SENT (OR FORCED ENABLE)?
     27 012706  001414                          BEQ     30$             ;;NO, SO
 DO NOTHING
     28 012710  032761  010000  000034          BIT     #TTXON,TTCHAR(R1) ;;YES,
 IS FEATURE REALLY THERE (FORCE CASE)?
     29 012716  001405                          BEQ     20$             ;;NOPE,
JUST CLEAR THE BIT
     30 012720                                  CALL    RSXCHR,R5,221   ;;YEP, O
UTPUT A (PARITY) XON
        012720  004567  000036                   JSR    R5,RSXCHR
        012724  000221                            .WORD 221
     31 012726                          10$:    CALL    SRTLIN          ;;STARTU
P THIS LINE
        012726  004767  176764                   JSR    PC,SRTLIN
     32 012732  042761  040000  000010  20$:    BIC     #TTXOFF,DDFLAG(R1) ;;SAY
 WE CANCELED THE XOFF
     33 012740                          30$:    CALLR   RDRRUN          ;;EXIT T
RYING TO RUN THAT READER...
        012740  000167  173212                   JMP    RDRRUN

      1                                 .SBTTL  RSX ORIENTED CHARACTER ROUTINES
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ;       R0 =  LINE NUMBER TIMES 2
      5                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
      6                                 ;       PRIORITY IS PR5

      8                                 ;       CALL    RSXCR
      9                                 ;

     11                                 ;-

 A <CR>
        012744  004567  000012                   JSR    R5,RSXCHR
        012750  000015                            .WORD 015
     14 012752  052761  000404  000010          BIS     #TTRSX2!TTRSX1,DDFLAG(R1
) ;;SAY A <LF> IS NOW NEEDED
     15 012760                                  RETURN                  ;;EXIT
        012760  000207                           RTS    PC
     16
     17                                 ;+
     18                                 ;       R0 =  LINE NUMBER TIMES 2
     19                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
     20                                 ;       PRIORITY IS PR5
     21                                 ;
     22                                 ;       CALL    RSXCHR,R5,<CHARACTER>
     23                                 ;
     24                                 ;       R4 =  UNDEFINED
     25                                 ;-

2
     28 012764  010346                          MOV     R3,-(SP)        ;; AND R
3
     29 012766  012502                          MOV     (R5)+,R2        ;;GET CH
ARACTER TO OUTPUT
     30 012770                                  CALL    CHOUT           ;; AND G
O OUTPUT IT
        012770  004767  175116                   JSR    PC,CHOUT
     31 012774                                  CALL    CHKLIN          ;;  THEN
 TRY TO START LINE
        012774  004767  176710                   JSR    PC,CHKLIN
     32 013000  012603                          MOV     (SP)+,R3        ;;RESTOR
E R3
     33 013002  012602                          MOV     (SP)+,R2        ;; AND R
2
     34 013004                                  RETURN  R5              ;;  THEN
 EXIT
        013004  000205                           RTS    R5
     35
     36                                 ;+
     37                                 ;       CALL    RSXEAT,R4,<CHARACTER>
     38                                 ;-

     42 013012  121514                          CMPB    (R5),(R4)       ;;YES, I
S LEADING CHARACTER CORRECT?
     43 013014  001004                          BNE     10$             ;;NOPE,
DON'T EAT ANYTHING

DVANCE POINTER BEYOND IT
     45 013020  005263  000002                  INC     XRLOC-XRBC(R3)  ;; AND A

SAY ONE LESS CHARACTER TO DO

XIT

CHECK FOR RSX MODE DESIRED/CURRENT

      1                                 .SBTTL  CHECK FOR RSX MODE DESIRED/CURRE
NT
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ;       R0 =  LINE NUMBER TIMES 2
      5                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
      6                                 ;       R3 -> XRB @ XRBC
      7                                 ;
      8                                 ;       CALL    CHKRSX,R5
      9                                 ;         --NORMAL MODE--
     10                                 ;         --RSX MODE & ALREADY IN RSX MO
DE--
     11                                 ;         --RSX MODE & NOW INTO IT (ALSO
 PR5)--
     12                                 ;
     13                                 ;       R4 =  UNDEFINED
     14                                 ;-
     15
     16 013032                          CHKRSX::SPLC    5               ;;TO LEV
EL 5 FOR SAFETY
        013032  012737  034240  177776           MOV    #PR5,@#PS
     17 013040  032763  001000  000012          BIT     #TO.RSX,XRMOD-XRBC(R3) ;
;DESIRE RSX MODE?
     18 013046                          .ASSUME TI.RSX  EQ      TO.RSX
     19 013046  001014                          BNE     20$             ;;YES
     20 013050  042763  007000  000012          BIC     #TO.SUF!TO.PRE!TO.RSX,XR
MOD-XRBC(R3) ;;NO, CLEAR THOSE BITS
     21 013056                          .ASSUME TI.RX2  EQ      TO.SUF
     22 013056                          .ASSUME TI.ISB  EQ      TO.PRE
     23 013056                          .ASSUME TI.RSX  EQ      TO.RSX
     24 013056                                  CALL    CHKDLF          ;;CHECK
FOR NEEDING A <LF>
        013056  004767  175666                   JSR    PC,CHKDLF
     25 013062  042761  000404  000010          BIC     #TTRSX2!TTRSX1,DDFLAG(R1
) ;;GET OUT OF RSX MODE
     26 013070                          10$:    SPLC    3               ;;BACK T
O LEVEL 3 AGAIN
        013070  012737  034140  177776           MOV    #PR3,@#PS
     27 013076                                  RETURN  R5              ;EXIT
        013076  000205                           RTS    R5
     28
     29 013100  005725                  20$:    TST     (R5)+           ;;SAY RS
X MODE AT LEAST DESIRED
     30 013102  032761  000404  000010          BIT     #TTRSX2!TTRSX1,DDFLAG(R1
) ;;ALREADY IN RSX MODE?
     31 013110  001367                          BNE     10$             ;;YES, T
AKE 2ND EXIT
     32 013112  005725                          TST     (R5)+           ;;NO, WE
'LL TAKE THE 3RD EXIT
     33 013114  105261  000011                  INCB    DDFLAG+1(R1)    ;;GO INT
O RSX EXTRA <LF> MODE
     34 013120                          .ASSUME TTRSX2  EQ      400
     35 013120                                  RETURN  R5              ;;EXIT S
TAYING AT PR5
        013120  000205                           RTS    R5

TE) TO DISABLE <ESC><P> GRAMMAR

 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 180
CHARACTER LISTS AND DISPATCH TABLES

      1                                 .IF     NE      KB2741
      2
      3                                 .SBTTL  2741 CODE CONVERSION ROUTINES
      4
      5                                 ;+
      6                                 ; CVASCD - CONVERT ASCII TO 2741 CODE.
      7                                 ; CVCDAS - CONVERT 2741 CODE TO ASCII.
      8                                 ;
      9                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
     10                                 ;       R2 =  CHARACTER
     11                                 ;
     12                                 ;       CALL    MAPPED,R5,CVASCD
     13                                 ;       CALL    MAPPED,R5,CVCDAS
     14                                 ;
     15                                 ;       R3 =  RANDOM
     16                                 ;       R4 =  2741 STATUS
     17                                 ;-
     18
     19                                         TMPORG  TTMAPD
     20
     21                                 CVASCD::TST     (PC)+           ;;SET C=
0 AND SKIP THE 'SEC'
     22                                 CVCDAS::SEC                     ;;SET C=
1
     23                                         MOV     ST2741(R1),R3   ;;GET 27
41 STATUS WORD
     24                                         MOV     R3,R4           ;; AND A
NOTHER COPY
     25                                         BIC     #^C<TTCODE>,R3  ;;CLEAR
OUT ALL BUT CODE INDEX
     26                                         MOV     XL2741(R3),R3   ;;GET XL
ATE TABLE ADDRESS
     27                                         BCS     60$             ;;BRANCH
 IF 2741 --> ASCII
     28
     29                                 GLOBAL  <ST2741>
 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 181
CHARACTER LISTS AND DISPATCH TABLES

      1                                 .SBTTL  ASCII TO 2741 CODE CONVERTER
      2
      3                                 10$:    BIC     #^C<177>,R2     ;;ENSURE
 GOOD 7 BIT ASCII
      4                                         ADD     R2,R3           ;;OFFSET
 INTO TABLE BY ASCII CODE
      5                                         BIT     R4,#TTOCVL      ;;OUTPUT
 CASE VALID ?
      6                                         BNE     20$             ;;YES, S
O NO CASE SHIFT YET
      7                                         BIC     #TTUC.O,R4      ;;NO, SO
 FORCE LOWER CASE ON OUTPUT
      8                                         CALL    50$,R5,037+TTOCVL ;;SEND
 THE LOWER CASE SHIFT AND MAKE OUTPUT CASE VALID
      9                                 20$:    MOVB    128.(R3),-(SP)  ;;STACK
2741 CHARACTER
     10                                         BPL     40$             ;;IF CAS
E DOESN'T MATTER, QUIT NOW
     11                                         BIT     #100,(SP)       ;;UPPER
CASE REQUIRED ?
     12                                         BNE     30$             ;;YES, D
O UPPER CASE CHECKS
     13                                         BIT     R4,#TTUC.O      ;;IN LOW
ER CASE NOW (FOR OUTPUT) ?
     14                                         BEQ     40$             ;;YES, S
O NO CASE SHIFT REQUIRED
     15                                         CALL    50$,R5,037+TTUC.O ;;NO,
SO SEND THE LOWER CASE SHIFTER AND SET LOWER CASE
     16                                         BR      40$             ;;RETURN
 2741 CHARACTER
     17
     18                                 30$:    BIT     R4,#TTUC.O      ;;IN UPP
ER CASE FOR OUTPUT NOW ?
     19                                         BNE     40$             ;;YES, S
O NO FURTHER DIDDLING
     20                                         CALL    50$,R5,034+TTUC.O ;;NO,
SO SEND UPPER CASE SHIFTER AND NOTE UPPER CASE
     21                                 40$:    MOV     (SP)+,R2        ;;GET BA
CK THE 2741 CHARACTER
     22                                         BIC     #^C<77>,R2      ;;ENSURE
 6 BITS
     23                                         BR      110$            ;;CLEAN
UP AND QUIT
     24
     25                                 50$:    MOV     (R5)+,R2        ;;GET CA
SE SHIFTER AND FLAG TO FLOP
     26                                         MOV     R3,-(SP)        ;;STORE
WILL CLOBBER R3
     27                                         MOV     R4,-(SP)        ;; AND R
4
     28                                         CALLX   STORE,R5,DDBUFC+FP ;;STO
RE THE CASE SHIFT IN OUTPUT BUFFER
     29                                         MOV     (SP)+,R4        ;;GET BA
CK 2741 STATUS
     30                                         MOV     (SP)+,R3        ;; AND C
ONVERSION TABLE POINTER
     31                                         CLRB    R2              ;;LEAVE
ONLY THE FLAG TO FLOP
     32                                         XOR     R2,R4           ;; AND F
LOP IT
     33                                         RETURN  R5              ;;SO MUC
H FOR CASE SHIFTS
     34
     35                                 GLOBAL  <ST2741>
 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 182
CHARACTER LISTS AND DISPATCH TABLES

      1                                 .SBTTL  2741 CODE TO ASCII CONVERTER
      2
      3                                 60$:    BIC     #^C<77>,R2      ;;ENSURE
 6 BIT 2741 CODE
      4                                         BIT     R4,#TTUC.I      ;;IN UPP
ER CASE NOW ?
      5                                         BNE     70$             ;;YES, S
O WE HAVE CORRECT TABLE BASE
      6                                         ADD     #64.,R3         ;;BUMP T
O LOWER CASE TABLE
      7                                 70$:    ADD     R2,R3           ;;ADD 27
41 CHARACTER TO TABLE BASE
      8                                         MOVB    (R3),R2         ;;PICKUP
 ASCII CHARACTER
      9                                         BPL     110$            ;;IF NOT
HING SPECIAL, QUIT NOW
     10                                         BIC     #^C<177>,R2     ;;CLEAR
OUT THE SPECIAL FLAG
     11                                         ASR     R2              ;;CASE S
HIFT ?
     12                                         BCC     80$             ;;NOPE
     13                                         BIC     #TTUC.I,R4      ;;YES, G
UESS AT L.C. SHIFT
     14                                         ASR     R2              ;;MOVE C
ASE TO CARRY
     15                                         ADC     R4              ;; AND S
ET PROPER CASE
     16                                         ;CLR    R2              ;;R2 IS
ZERO BY NOW (RETURN NULL)
     17                                         BR      110$            ;;IMMEDI
ATELY IF NOT SOONER
     18
     19                                 80$:    BIC     #TTOCVL,R4      ;;NOTE O
UTPUT CASE INVALID
     20                                         CMP     R2,#015         ;;WERE I
T A CR = LC RETURN ?
     21                                         BEQ     90$             ;;TWER
     22                                         CMP     R2,#012         ;;HOW AB
OUT LF = UC RETURN
     23                                         BNE     100$            ;;NEITHE
R
     24                                 90$:    BIS     #TTCRIN,R4      ;;NOTE T
HAT WE'VE SEEN CR OR LF
     25                                         MOVB    DDHORC(R1),R3   ;;GET MA
X HORIZONTAL POSITION
     26                                         SUB     DDHORZ(R1),R3   ;;NOW FI
ND THE DIFFERENCE
     27                                         ADD     #TTSEQ1,R3      ;;ROUND
UP THE VALUE
     28                                         BIC     #^C<TTSEQC>,R3  ;; AND T
RIM THE VALUE
     29                                         BIS     R3,R4           ;;OR IN
THE FILL VALUE
     30                                         BR      110$            ;; AND P
ASS IT ALONG
     31
     32                                 100$:   BIS     #TTSTAT,R4      ;;SAY KB
 LOCKED & NOT <EOA> OR <EOT> YET
     33                                         BIT     #TTCRIN,R4      ;;HAVE W
E SEEN A CR
     34                                         BEQ     110$            ;;NO, SO
 HE HIT ATTENTION
     35                                         BIC     #TTCRIN,R4      ;;NORMAL
 CR,EOT SEQUENCE
     36                                         MOV     #SRTLIN,MAPORA(SP) ;;GET
 TRANSMIT INTERRUPT
     37
     38                                 110$:   MOV     R4,ST2741(R1)   ;;RESTOR
E UPDATED 2741 STATUS
     39                                         RETURN                  ;; AND R
ETURN SMILING
     40
     41                                         UNORG
     42
     43                                 GLOBAL  <ST2741>
 TTDVR   TERMINAL DRIVER MACRO V03.01 27-JUN-85 23:14:08 PAGE 183
CHARACTER LISTS AND DISPATCH TABLES

      1                                 .SBTTL  CHECK FOR UNLOCKING 2741 KEYBOAR
D
      2
      3                                 ;+
      4                                 ; CHKLCK - CHECK FOR UNLOCKING 2741 KEYB
OARD.
      5                                 ;
      6                                 ;       R1 -> DDB
      7                                 ;
      8                                 ;       CALL    CHKLCK,R5
      9                                 ;
     10                                 ;       R4 =  UNDEFINED
     11                                 ;
     12                                 ;       FIRST EXIT MEANS LOCKED STATE IS
 O.K.
     13                                 ;       SECOND EXIT MEANS KEYBOARD MUST
BE UNLOCKED
     14                                 ;-
     15
     16                                 CHKLCK::MOVB    DDJBNO(R1),R4   ;;GET TH
E JOB NUMBER IF ANY
     17                                         BIC     #1,R4           ;;ENSURE
 WE COVER THE DISABLED CASE...
     18                                         BEQ     10$             ;;IF NO
JOB THEN ALWAYS UNLOCK THE KB
     19                                         TSTB    DDCNT(R1)       ;;JUST A
SSIGNED?
     20                                         BEQ     10$             ;;IF SO,
 THEN TURN AROUND LINE
     21                                         BIT     JBSTAT(R4),JBWAIT(R4) ;;
IF A JOB, IS IT RUNNABLE?
     22                                         BNE     20$             ;;IF RUN
NABLE THEN LEAVE KB ALONE
     23                                         BIT     #JS.KB,JBWAIT(R4) ;;IF N
ON-RUNNABLE, WOULD AN UNLOCK HELP?
     24                                         BEQ     20$             ;;NOPE,
SO LEAVE KB ALONE
     25                                 10$:    TST     (R5)+           ;;SECOND
 EXIT, UNLOCK THE KEYBOARD
     26                                 20$:    RETURN  R5              ;;NOW EX
IT
     27
     28                                 GLOBAL  <JBSTAT,JBWAIT>
     29
     30                                 .ENDC   ;KB2741
